src:
Super Beetle Tahun 1974 ini Jadi Lucky Draw Jogja VW Festival
06 Nov 2019, 06:16 by Muh. Syaifullah (Kontributor), Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta - Super Beetle 1303 keluaran tahun 1974 German Look menjadi hadiah di Jogja Volkswagen Festival 2019 (Jogja VW Festival). Kapasitas mesin 1.600 cc dengan empat silinder. Acara inti digelar di Jogja Expo Center, 9-10 November 2019.
Sudah menjadi tradisi sejak pertama diselenggarakan tahun 2013, event dua tahunan, Jogja Volkswagen Festival selalu ada lucky draw (door prize) sebuah mobil VW. Pada perhelatan dua tahun lalu, lucky draw nya adalah VW Beetle tahun 1967 dengan gaya Californian Look.
“Tahun ini sebuah mobil VW Beetle keluaran tahun 1974 seri 1303 yang sudah di restorasi dengan style German Look siap jadi milik pengunjung Jogja Volkswagen Festival 2019 yang beruntung. Konsep lucky draw kali ini adalah German Look segala sesuatunya bergaya German,” kata Tjahjo Widjodjono ketua pelaksana Jogja Volkswagen Festival 2019, Rabu, 6 November 2019.
Mobil lucky draw produksi German ini dimodifikasi di berbagai bagian dengan mengganti part, mengurangi atau menambah bagian-bagian tertentu. Dengan acuan gaya/style German Look sehingga mobil sudah tidak standar pabrik lagi. Namun, kata dia, VW Beetle ini tetap aman, nyaman dan layak dikendarai di jalan raya.
“Walaupun ada perubahan di sana-sini, kami tetap mengutamakan keamanan dan kelayakan di jalan raya, perubahannya hanya merombak penampilan mobil, sehingga kami pastikan mobil ini layak dikendarai di jalan raya dan aman,” kata Tjahjo.
Tjahjo juga menyampaikan lucky draw ini adalah hasil gotong-royong banyak pihak. Banyak pihak yang terlibat dalam mewujudkan lucky draw ini. Untuk pengadaan mobilnya panitia bersama keluarga besar Volkswagen Club Yogyakarta (VCY), memproses restorasinya yang melibatkan beberapa bengkel di Yogyakarta. Antara alin Concept Classic, Rohmat Bengkel, Is Interior, Pak Cip Electrical, Griya VW, dan Smartvolks.
Sedangkan berbagai part-nya di dukung oleh: Heritage Parts Centre (Inggris), Flat -4 (Jepang), Retro Road Trips (Belgia), TJ Wheels (Yogyakarta) dan Bursa VW Lawang (Jawa Timur).
“Kami bergotong-royong untuk mempersembahkan yang terbaik, dan secara khusus kami mengapresiasi serta berterima kasih atas dukungan dan kerja samanya, effort teman-teman ini sangat luar biasa,” kata dia.
Sementara Humas Jogja Volkswagen Festival Sutoto mengatakan lucky draw ini akan diberikan secara gratis kepada pengunjung JVWF yang beruntung tanpa dipungut biaya. Syaratnya hanya dengan datang ke Jogja Volkswagen Festival 2019, di JEC pada tanggal 9-10 November 2019, dan membeli tiket seharga Rp 50 ribu on the spot.
“Kalau dinilai berapa harga lucky draw untuk Jogja VW Festival ini, gotong royong, kami tidak bisa mengukur harganya,” kata dia.
text:
The 1974 Super Beetle became the Lucky Draw Jogja VW Festival
Nov 6 2019, 06:16 by Muh. Syaifullah (Contributor), Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Yogyakarta - Super Beetle 1303 released in 1974 German Look became a present at the 2019 Jogja Volkswagen Festival (Jogja VW Festival). 1,600 cc engine capacity with four cylinders. The main event will be held at the Jogja Expo Center, 9-10 November 2019.
It has been a tradition since it was first held in 2013, a biennial event, the Jogja Volkswagen Festival is always a lucky draw (door prize) for a VW car. At the event two years ago, the lucky draw was the 1967 VW Beetle in the Californian Look style.
"This year a 1974 Beetle VW output 1303 series that has been restored with the German Look style is ready to belong to the lucky visitors of Jogja Volkswagen Festival 2019. The lucky draw concept this time is German Look, everything is in German style, "said Tjahjo Widjodjono, chairman of the 2019 Jogja Volkswagen Festival, Wednesday, November 6, 2019.
This German lucky draw car is modified in various parts by replacing parts, reducing or adding certain parts. With reference to the style / style of German Look so that the car is no longer the factory standard. However, he said, the VW Beetle is still safe, comfortable and worth driving on the highway.
"Even though there have been changes here and there, we continue to prioritize safety and feasibility on the highway, the changes only overhaul the appearance of the car, so we make sure this car is worth driving on the highway and safe," said Tjahjo.
Tjahjo also conveyed that this lucky draw was the result of mutual cooperation of many parties. Many parties are involved in realizing this lucky draw. For the procurement of the car the committee together with the Volkswagen Club Yogyakarta (VCY) extended family, processed the restoration process which involved several workshops in Yogyakarta. Among other Concepts Classic, Rohmat Bengkel, Is Interior, Mr. Cip Electrical, Griya VW, and Smartvolks.
While the various parts are supported by: Heritage Parts Center (UK), Flat-4 (Japan), Retro Road Trips (Belgium), TJ Wheels (Yogyakarta) and the VW Lawang Exchange (East Java).
"We work together to offer the best, and in particular we appreciate and thank you for your support and cooperation, the efforts of these friends are extraordinary," he said.
While the Volkswagen Festival Sutoto Public Relations Sutoto said this lucky draw will be given free of charge to lucky JVWF visitors free of charge. The only requirement is to come to the 2019 Volkswagen Jogja Festival, at JEC on November 9-10, 2019, and buy a ticket for IDR 50 thousand on the spot.
"If it is judged how much the lucky draw for the Jogja VW Festival is, mutual cooperation, we cannot measure the price," he said.
